description:
We all know that professional video productions can run thousands of dollars just to get started.

However, with the technology we have today, my Online Course can show you a step-by-step process to start producing your content immediately.

You don't have a camera?

What if I showed you how to do it with your smartphone, iPhone or any digital camera you may already own?

YES, I'm serious.

I have over 20 years of creating award winning content for businesses such as Verizon, Walmart, Loreal, and Barnes and Noble. I've taken all of my experience and simplified it for you in this Course.

In this Course I will take you by the hand, step by step from:

  • Writing your script
  • Preparing for the shoot
  • Shooting day
  • Post production â€œediting"
  • All the way to delivery
title: Guerrilla Filmmaking for Business by Danny Foxx 1 Way Films
